name: Mortar Defense
description:
Mortar Defense

Mortar Defense is a demo tower defense game featuring the plugin Turret Plugin for Unreal engine 4. There are five levels and The player has to create defense towers to restrict the army of humanoid robots to get to the castle gate. This game shows the capabilities of the turret plugin. For android Please contact me on Discord
